text.section:
Every truck, truck tractor, and bus operated on highways in this State, except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, shall be identified with the name or trade name of its owner, operator, or lessee and shall display:
A United States Department of Transportation number; or
The number issued by a State agency.

The display of identification required by this section shall comply with the regulations promulgated by the federal Motor Carrier Safety Administration relating to vehicles operating interstate, as codified in 49 C.F.R., Part 390.21.
This section does not prohibit the display of any additional identification required by other laws of this State or any other state, or by any agency or department of the federal government.
